summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 6th Avenue Northeast, from East 53rd Street to East 55th Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 93401 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
